<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Gnoll Sergeant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=231)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

When gnolls band together to form hunting or raiding parties, the strongest among them is often designated the leader or sergeant. These gnolls train extensively in the art of war. Their skill at arms and the respect they command make them powerful adversaries. In smaller clans or single family units, a gnoll sergeant might also serve as the group’s leader in other affairs, such as sorting out domestic disputes or negotiating with rival gnoll clans.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

</column>

</row>

**Perception** +10; darkvision

[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17)

[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +10

</column>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +12

**Will** +8 

</row>

**Attack of Opportunity** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +14 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +12 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Bark Orders** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101)) The gnoll sergeant commands its allies to reposition. Any allies who hear and understand this order can use a reaction to Step.

**Pack Attack**   A gnoll sergeant deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature that’s within reach of at least two of the gnoll sergeant's allies.

**Rugged Travel**   A gnoll ignores the first square of difficult terrain it moves into each time it Steps or Strides.

</column>
